description: Paneer butter masala, also known as butter paneer is a rich & creamy curry made with paneer, spices, onions, tomatoes, cashews and butter.
Fried rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, seafood, or meat.

Lasagna is a wide, flat sheet of pasta. Lasagna can refer to either the type of noodle or to the typical lasagna dish which is a dish made with several layers of lasagna sheets with sauce and other ingredients, such as meats and cheese, in between the lasagna noodles.
A burger is a flat round mass of minced meat or vegetables, which is fried and often eaten in a bread roll.
Pizza, dish of Italian origin consisting of a flattened disk of bread dough topped with some combination of olive oil, oregano, tomato, olives, mozzarella or other cheese, and many other ingredients.

French Fries, also called chips, finger chips, fries, or French pommes frites, side dish or snack typically made from deep-fried potatoes that have been cut into various shapes, especially thin strips.
Shawarma is made of spit-roasted layers of lamb, beef, or other meat that are sliced and often wrapped in or served with pita.
